attributes.action: Force the FA to give Cardiff an English berth in the UEFA cup should they win the FA Cup
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The FA are currently refusing to grant Caridff City their rightfully-earned place in the UEFA cup should they win the FA cup, on the grounds of them being a Welsh team. This ruling is clearly unjust, as it discriminates against Welsh clubs in England, rendering Cardiff, Wrexham, and Swansea unable to qualify for European competition, regardless of how well they perform in domestic competition.

We, the undersigned, petition the Prime Minister to pressure the FA into reversing their decision, and allowing Cardiff a place in the UEFA cup should they be victorious in the FA cup.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
